    • Constructor Detail

      • OracleJdbcDirectory

        public OracleJdbcDirectory(OraclePool pool,
                           java.lang.String tableName)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a new Oracle directory. Creates new JdbcDirectorySettings using it's default values.
        Parameters:
        pool - The data source to use
        tableName - The table name
        Throws:
        OracleIndexException
        java.sql.SQLException
